name: Chibi-Robo! Park Patrol [NDS]
description:
A pollution epidemic is transforming the local park into a contaminated
wasteland. It's up to Chibi-Robo to return the park to its former glory
and defeat Sergeant Smogglor, champion of all things toxic and gross.
With his trusty squirter and boom box in hand, Chibi must raise flowers,
defeat noxious Smoglings and save the world.

Touch controls let players interact with the world in new ways. Slide
the stylus with good timing to squirt enemies, water flowers, pedal a
bike and blast a boom box.

Chibi's mission is bigger than ever this time around. Instead of
living in a single home with one family, Chibi's on his own in the
park now, spreading happiness to an entire town. The screen might be
smaller, but the world is much bigger.

As Chibi progresses in this green adventure, he'll meet all sorts of
colorful characters, like marionette Francois, football mascot Bull
and soda "spokesanimals" Pop and Fizz. If Chibi befriends these toys,
they will help him in his quest to fix the park.
